questiontext.text: After OR-assisted routing, the number of routes decreases while total distance traveled remains approximately the same. Total transportation cost still decreases. What is the primary reason for this cost reduction?

feedback.text: Variable cost per kilometer does not change simply due to routing consolidation.

Higher utilization does not imply higher demand.
